summary: There are a few suggested changes that can bring your solution closer to ideal.

params.bad_code:
Instead of: 
```python
import sys


def print_python_version():  # [missing-function-docstring]
    print(sys.version)
```
params.good_code:
Try: 
```python
import sys


def print_python_version():
    """Function printing python version."""
    print(sys.version)
```

params.message: Unnecessary "elif" after "return", remove the leading "el" from "elif
